name: super-nintendo-game-info
description: Get information on every official North American SNES game release.
author: Ian Rose

scripts.format: prettier --check --write "**/*.{js, json, html, css, scss, md}"
scripts.format-ci: prettier -l --write "**/*.{js, json, html, css, scss, md}"
scripts.install-all: npm install && (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 npm start" "cd server && PORT=3001 npm start"
